SARD Medical Revalidation covers all aspects of the appraisal and revalidation process to full GMC requirements, including evidence portfolio creation, online MAG form, Educator’s Appraisal functionality and powerful real-time reporting capabilities. Simple to use and highly configurable to meet your organisation’s unique requirements, with built-in live chat support for doctors.

Features

  • Configurable Evidence Portfolio
  • Secure 24/7/365 web access from anywhere
  • Powerful custom compliance reporting
  • Advanced administration and user management system
  • Advanced search and real-time reporting functionality
  • Individual, Appraiser and Responsible Officer dashboards
  • Import MAG forms automatically
  • Educator’s Appraisal module
  • Complete audit trail
  • Fully configurable automatic reminder system

Advantages

  • Access all medical revalidation information via a single, powerful interface
  • Simple, intuitive design promotes user engagement
  • System access from multiple devices
  • Major administrative savings over existing data capture methods
  • Flexible to the unique requirements of each organisation
  • MAG form based interface
  • Designed by an NHS trust and software specialists
  • Improve compliance and engagement rates via powerful reporting features
  • Best-in-class doctor and technical support via live chat
